instruction: Generate at least 5 ways to reduce paper waste.
output:
1. Use both sides of the paper
2. Choose digital forms instead of written
3. Recycle used paper
4. Donate unwanted books and magazines
5. Print double-sided whenever possible
6. Use e-tickets and receipts instead of paper
7. Use less paper when possible and switch to reusable alternatives such as cloth towels and napkins
8. Invest in a reusable water bottle
